Actions.Name: Crushing Jaw
Actions.PostEffects: Deals bonus damage to bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Shoulder Check
Actions.Description: An adjacent character takes 2 damage and is shoved 1.
Actions.PostEffects: The [name] may spend additional actions on this ability. For every action spent, increase the shove and damage by +2.

Actions.Name: Steel Jaw
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 3 spaces in any direction. An adjacent foe when it starts moving takes 2 damage and must save or be shoved 2 towards it. Bloodied foes fail the save.
